text: Peter A. Peyser (September 7, 1921 - October 9, 2014) was an American politician. He was a United States Representative from New York. He served as representative from 1971 to 1977 as a Republican and from 1979 to 1983 as a Democrat. On October 9, 2014, he died of Parkinson's disease. He was 93.Peter A. Peyser, congressman from Westchester dies at 93 from New York Times.com.
